xwikidoc.title: Run a query on the XWiki Database
xwikidoc.content:
<%
  def query = request.query;
  if (query==null)
    query = "show processlist";
%>
<form action="">
 Query: <input type="text" name="query" value="$query" size="80" />
 <input type="submit" value="Go" /> 
</form> 
<%  
   if (request.query) {
    def context2 = context.getContext();
    def store = xwiki.getXWiki().getStore().getStore();
    store.beginTransaction(context2);
    def session = store.getSession(context2);
    def connection = session.connection();
    def stmt = connection.createStatement();
    try {
       sql = request.query;
       def resultset = stmt.executeQuery(sql);
       def mdata = resultset.getMetaData();
       def nbcols = mdata.getColumnCount();
       println "{table}"
       for (def i=1;i<=nbcols;i++) {
         print  mdata.getColumnName(i) ;
           if (i!=nbcols)
            print "|";
       }
       println "";
       while (true) {
          resultset.next();
          for (i=1;i<=nbcols;i++) {
           def value = resultset.getString(i);
           if ((value==null)||(value==""))
            value = " "
           print value
           if (i!=nbcols)
            print "|";
          }
          println "";
          if (resultset.isLast())         
            break;
       } 
       println "{table}"
       stmt.close();
    } catch (Exception e2) {
       println "* Error running sql: ${sql} " + e2.getMessage();
    } finally {
      stmt.close();
    }
   } 
%>
